name: LocalShowsToday
0:
”Alexa, open Local Shows.”
”Alexa, ask Local Shows for Chicago.”
”Alexa, ask Local Shows for Seattle.”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: local shows
des: Local Shows Today gives Today's shows in the city your choice. Use the phrase "Alexa, ask Local Shows for Chicago", to get shows in Chicago. But it works for any city. Simply replace Chicago with your city of choice.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
